messages.subject: siblings...getting along!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone - I just wanted to say thank you for all of your posts.  Reading them gives me such encouragement and support.  I am also grateful for everyone who
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone -

I just wanted to say thank you for all of your posts. Reading them gives me such encouragement and support. I am also grateful for everyone who answers my specific questions with such thoughtful responses. Mmmmmmm!!

Last night I heard my kids talking things out and finding solutions together to what ever problems were coming up.

Last night I helped my husband deal with a work issue for nearly an hour while my kids played together and ate together. A couple of times they came in to check on us, and then they went back to playing and eating.

Last night I enjoyed the pleasure of having both of my kids in the house at the same time!

And, I can tell you that this has not always been the case.

And, I can tell you that switching to un-schooling has paved the way for this sibling healing.

Thanks!

Love,

Elli
